Name: Panic Attack
About the game: After an accident on the surface of Mars, the astronaut was left alone to survive on an alien planet. The alien army isn't too happy about the alien. Fortunately, some weapons survived, you need to get to a safe point, they will regret that they got in his way. Panic Attack is a Hardcore platformer that develops shooting and reaction skills. Destroy the alien evil spirits, freeing the way for a person. Feature of game: - Complexity - Beautiful Visual style - Dynamic Music - 30 levels
